basics.name: Vinícius B. Bernardini
basics.label: Senior Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I am a professional trained in IT by IQ, a student in the course of Systems Analysis and Development by FADERGS, i am passionate for technology and how it can help people achieve their goals in a simpler and more agile way.

work.name: Bonuz
work.summary:
I'm part of Bonuz's IT team, working on finding solutions, improvements and corrections for the platform and developing proposed solutions

Main activities carried out:

• Architectural design of new systems
• Development and maintenance of internal systems
• Code reviews
• System deployments
• Server maintenance
• Project versioning
• Sprint planning

work.name: Laureate International Universities
work.summary:
I was part of the EAD analysis and development team for academic management systems at Laureate International Universities.

I acted as a systems analyst in relation to the survey for solutions and as a developer carrying out the proposed solutions.

Main activities carried out:

• Development and maintenance of the academic system that served AI's across the country
• Development of internal projects for integration between the institution's and third-party systems through APIs
• Code reviews

work.name: Computecnica Tecnologia
work.summary:
I was part of the EAD analysis and development team for the academic management systems at Laureate International Universities.

I worked as a systems analyst in relation to the survey for solutions and as a developer carrying out the proposed solutions.

work.name: Alright Media Technology Hub
Ondaweb
work.summary:
I started my IT career at Ondaweb, I started with the support where I maintained the institutional websites developed by the company, which were mostly developed in Wordpress.

With the experience giving support and understanding the structure of the CMS, I started to develop websites in addition to taking care of the company's support sector.

Main activities carried out:

• Maintenance of institutional websites making changes and corrections to implemented features
• Development of pages in Wordpress
• Creation of landing pages in HTML/CSS
• Customer service

education.studyType: Tecnólogo em Análise e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas

certificates.name: Curso de PHP Avançando com OO.
Minha Primeira Single Page Application com React
Wordpress: Crie temas do zero com bootstrap 3

skills.name: Slim Framework · Vuejs · RabbitMQ · PHP · PostgreSQL · Laravel · Jquery · Docker

references.name: Airton Júnior Menerosa
references.reference: Tive a honra de trabalhar com o Vinícius Bernardini na Alright AdTech Company, e tenho o prazer dizer que ele nunca foi somente um colega de trabalho. Mas sim, um irmão que a vida me deu! Comprometido, didático no modo de se expressar e um coração cheio amor pelo que faz. Um profissional que sabe fazer a diferença, e que aceita o desafio.

references.name: Bruno Lemos
references.reference: Exímio profissional. Sempre soube resolver todas as situações operacionais, muito didático pra explicar questões de sistemas para quem não "falava a mesma língua". Além disso, ser humano incrível, sabe lidar com pessoas e grupos.
